ul.li: The "background" property is a shorthand property for setting the individual background properties (i.e., background-color, background-image, background -repeat, background-attachment, and background-position) at the same place in the style sheet.

body.p: If statement above is passed, this paragraph should have a flag image that is not repeated, is scrolled, and is centered. The background of the page should be lime color. The rules applied are "p {background: url(flagbg.gif) no-repeat scroll center}" and "body {background: lime}". All other properties of this page are UA-default. aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa bbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbb
